body:
`NamedValue` is now a poor name. In fact, NamedValue essentially serves the same purpose as `SymbolicVariable` now (i.e. it is a wrapper around Value* that makes it easier to generate code, report errors, and have overloaded operators). 

A future PR can and should just merge NamedValue and SymbolicVariable, choosing a better name.
body_html:

A future PR can and should just merge NamedValue and SymbolicVariable, choosing a better name.
body_text:
NamedValue is now a poor name. In fact, NamedValue essentially serves the same purpose as SymbolicVariable now (i.e. it is a wrapper around Value* that makes it easier to generate code, report errors, and have overloaded operators).
A future PR can and should just merge NamedValue and SymbolicVariable, choosing a better name.
